SettingsÂ¶

ANALYTICS_PROVIDER
The fully-qualified module and class name of the analytics provider to use to track events (defaults to ‘bambu_analytics.providers.google.UniversalAnalyticsProvider’)
ANALYTICS_SETTINGS
A dictionary mapping the provider class name (ie: ‘UniversalAnalyticsProvider’) to a number of settings, defined by each provider individually. For example, the Google providers both require a setting called ID
